title: Organizational Capacity Building
summary: Strengthen organizations through training, systems development, and ongoing technical support for sustainable impact.
body:
We build the capacity of local organizations, community groups, and government agencies to effectively plan, implement, and manage development initiatives. Our approach combines classroom training with hands-on mentoring and systems development.

We have supported over 50 organizations across Ghana to strengthen their governance, financial management, program delivery, and monitoring and evaluation systems.
capabilities: Strategic planning and business model development
contactCTAOverride: Strengthen your organization's capacity for impact.
